textBeforeTable: For residential summer schools priority is given to students from state schools outside London. Residential summer schools View the 2015 Summer School brochure (pdf) Eligibility criteria Please note that for these programmes there are certain eligibility criteria. UCL runs a number of residential and non-residential schools for students in year 12 attending state schools. These aim to give students a taste of university life and the degree programmes we offer.
